analyzed: saccam kira tvam api bhūri pañña

original: Yā tādisī sīri dhitī matī ca;
analyzed: yā tādisī sīri dhitī matī ca
sukhīpi ha ike na karonti pāpa
avaṇṇa sa sagga bhayā punar eke

original: Chandā ca dosā na jahanti dhammaṁ”.
analyzed: chandā ca dosā na jahanti dhamma
ye ca assa kaṅkham vinayanti santaḥ
tam hissa dīpam ca parāyanam ca
alasaḥ gihī kāma bhogī na sādhu

original: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṁ na sādhu.
analyzed: yaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kodhanaḥ tam na sādhu
